document_data.name: ''Wand of Flame Strike''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of flame strike''''' were magic [[wand]]s, usable by [[cleric]]s, [[paladin]]s, and [[ranger]]s, allowing the wielder to harness the deadly divine flames.
document_data.Description: ''Wands of flame strike'' were slender [[birch]] rods with scorch marks.
document_data.Powers: These wands allowed the wielder to cast the ''[[flame strike]]'' spell. Each wand held at least one charge.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], several ''sands of flame strike'' could be found in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] during the ruins' occupation by the [[Cult of the Dragon]]. Some of the high-ranking members of the Cult, stationed in [[Castle Cormanthor]] carried there wands. Another wand could be recovered from the laboratory of a mad [[lich]], [[Thyaast Ammath]], in the deepest parts of the [[Elven Catacombs]], by the chasm that led into the [[Underdark]].
